tool_description: Creates a comprehensive pet profile including species, breed, age, weight, and basic characteristics needed for nutritional calculations.

species.description: Pet species (dog, cat, rabbit, bird, ferret, guinea pig, hamster)

error_messages: Invalid species: Use one of [dog, cat, rabbit, bird, ferret, guinea pig, hamster]
Age out of range: Age must be between 0.1 and 30 years
Weight out of range: Weight must be between 0.1 and 100 kg
Invalid sex designation: Use one of [male, female, neutered_male, spayed_female]
usage: Provide species, age_years, weight_kg, and sex as required parameters. Optionally specify breed for more accurate calculations.

profile_id.description: Unique identifier for this pet profile

life_stage.description: Current life stage (puppy/kitten, juvenile, adult, senior)
